objectives: Students will discuss shopping and consumer behavior using Expert/Academic register language
Students will engage with Fantasy themed scenarios related to shopping and consumer behavior
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of expert level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining shopping and consumer behavior content with Fantasy narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore shopping and consumer behavior through a Fantasy lens using Expert/Academic language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a magical or fantastical situation involving shopping and consumer behavior

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice expert register vocabulary related to shopping and consumer behavior in a fantasy context
Students engage in fantasy themed role-play about shopping and consumer behavior using expert register
Students create original fantasy themed content about shopping and consumer behavior in expert register

discussion_questions: How would you describe shopping and consumer behavior in a Fantasy scenario?
What magical or enchanted might be involved in shopping and consumer behavior?
Can you create a Fantasy story about shopping and consumer behavior?
How does shopping and consumer behavior change when viewed through a Fantasy perspective?
What expert register expressions would you use to discuss this fantasy scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Fantasy situation involving shopping and consumer behavior
roles: Character A: Using expert register in fantasy context
Character B: Responding in expert register within fantasy theme

topic_genre_blend: shopping and consumer behavior with magical
shopping and consumer behavior with enchanted
shopping and consumer behavior with mystical

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Expert/Academic throughout: Scholarly, technical, high-level discourse
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Fantasy theme: Magic, mythical creatures, imaginary worlds

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Expert/Academic register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Fantasy themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of expert register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
